title: Electric Meter/Service UtilityRoom: An independent and ventilated Electric meter/Service utility room directly accessible from the outside common areas shall be provided on ground floor and/or on upper floors/Podium/Parking floor and in the first basement floor with properventilation, according to the requirements of the electric supply undertaking
clause_text: Electric Meter/Service UtilityRoom: An independent and ventilated Electric meter/Service utility room directly accessible from the outside common areas shall be provided on ground floor and/or on upper floors/Podium/Parking floor and in the first basement floor with properventilation, according to the requirements of the electric supply undertaking. The door to the room shall have fire resistance of not less than two hours.
